short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to improve the user experience within the iMIS Staff Site. Made with ❤️ by the iMIS community and CSI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Current Features:

• Improves the IQA editing experience
• Copy the IQA full path right from the IQA browser
• Enhanced RiSE content editor experience
• The Work Bar - search, lookup, or navigate to almost anything in iMIS!

Learn more about iMIS: https://imis.com
Open source: https://github.com/CSI-Inc/imis-experience-plus
